DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare duloxetine antidepressant treatment severe depression .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing Duloxetine Other Antidepressants Treatment Severe Depression
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : At least 18 year age Have major depression currently severe depressive episode Have degree understanding patient communicate investigator study staff All females must test negative pregnancy Females childbearing potential must use reliable method birth control study 1 month take last dose study drug Exclusion criterion : Have respond duloxetine depression past Have history bipolar disorder , psychotic disorder ( schizophrenia ) , cognitive disorder ( moderate severe dementia ) , obsessivecompulsive disorder ( OCD ) Are significant risk suicide Have respond 2 adequate trial antidepressant medication current depressive episode Have serious , unstable medical condition Have current recent history substance abuse dependence Have electroconvulsive therapy ( ECT ) , transcranial magnetic stimulation ( rTMS ) , vagus nerve stimulation ( VNS ) past year Have start psychotherapy within 6 week prior study entry Have serious medical illness clinically significant laboratory abnormality stabilize anticipate , judgment investigator , require hospitalization use exclude medication course study
